Text: Please Seed as long as possible to get this torrent flowing.
My inexperience caused me to forget to designate that this movie is NTSC and not PAL, for those of you who need to know.  Sorry.
Thanks for this. What was the source for the ISO?

The original was decrypted with DVD Decrypter.  It then was run through DVD Shrink to get the file size down.  Then the Video_TS folder was processed by the "build mode" of Image Burn to create the .iso file we have here.
Watched it last night. Great quality all round. Thanks again!
